svg.font-family: SauceCodePro Nerd Font, Source Code Pro, Courier

g.text: Create file size badges. Also works for `rollup-plugin-filesize` usage.
<typeName>=<color> (<color>: CSS-Color|Hex as: ffffff|Hex stroke as s{ffffff})
to all; can be any of
<color>[, <color>] (<color>: CSS-Color|Hex as: ffffff|Hex stroke as s{ffffff})
